meanings.definition: Bankrupts (verb): causes someone to become bankrupt
meanings.sent2: Medical bills can bankrupt a family if not managed carefully.
meanings.sent3: His love for luxury bankrupts his savings every month.
meanings.sent4: The storm bankrupts the land of its fertile soil.
meanings.sent5: The reckless behavior bankrupts their chances of success.

meanings.definition: Bankrupts (noun): people who have been declared bankrupt
meanings.sent1: The number of bankrupts seeking financial advice is increasing.
meanings.sent2: After the economic crisis, many new bankrupts emerged.
meanings.sent3: The group of bankrupts started a support group to share experiences.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a lost soul among the bankrupts at the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to help the bankrupts rebuild their lives.
